divs: sighting detailsmy family and i were taking a walk at bluff point, at about 2 pm local time, when i happened to glance up at the sky and see these black dots{actually, first i saw the white puffs, then i noticed something was actually making the puffs, little black dots} flying formation and leaving behind them a series of puffs of smoke (best way to describe it) i could hear jet engine noise and piston engine noise, however we were really close to the groton-new london airport. so i can't tell if they were making any noise. we were on the way back, close to the water and we could see the airport across the water. my daughter got very excited and thought they might be space ships, my wife didn't know what to think about them. i thought it might be a secret plane, but i'm puzzled at the slow speed and the fact that the dots seemed to make a new puff every 1-1\2 to 2 seconds, a slow interval i thought for it to be an engine. besides they seemed to be moving at the average pace of airliners when they are leaving contrails, when flying high.we then took a few photos and tried to play it off. however, my wife later encouraged my to report the experience since we had taken some pics. oh! the dates on the pictures are wrong. i never took the time to enter the right date on the camera. as far as our right location we were headed north towards the picnic area. we were on the western most trail just before were the trail forks. the objects seemed to be going roughly from west to east.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Groton
There were no other sightings in Groton on or around July 12th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
